name: Basic User Creation
script:
if frappe.db.exists("User", doc.email):

    # Get existing user
    user = frappe.get_doc("User", doc.email)

    # Update fields
    user.first_name = doc.first_name
    user.last_name = doc.last_name
    user.mobile_no = doc.mobile_no
    user.enabled = 1
    user.role_profile_name = doc.role_profile
    user.module_profile = doc.module_profile

    user.save(ignore_permissions=True)

else:

    # Create new user
    user = frappe.get_doc({
        "doctype": "User",
        "email": doc.email,
        "first_name": doc.first_name,
        "last_name": doc.last_name,
        "mobile_no": doc.mobile_no,
        "enabled": 1,
        "send_welcome_email": 1,
        "role_profile_name": doc.role_profile,
        "module_profile": doc.module_profile
    })

    user.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
